H0.text: England and Surrey cricketing twins Alec and Eric had what surname. Trueman

H1.text: England and Surrey cricketing twins Alec and Eric had what surname. Compton

H2.text: England and Surrey cricketing twins Alec and Eric had what surname. Edrich

H3.text: England and Surrey cricketing twins Alec and Eric had what surname. Bedser

A4.text: Eric Harry Edrich was an English first-class cricketer.

A5.text: Edrich played in 36 first-class matches for Lancashire as a wicketkeeper between 1946 and 1948.

A6.text: Edrich was subsequently appointed captain in 1973 and led Surrey to second position in the County Championship in his first year in charge and then secured Surrey their first limited overs silverware the following year with victory in the Benson and Hedges Cup.

A7.text: Surrey won the County Championship only once, in 1971 during the career of England opener John Edrich and under the captaincy of Micky Stewart.
